snippet.title: Kingdom Eighties - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | gamescom 2022
snippet.description:
Kingdom Eighties is the new title in the award-winning Kingdom series. A narrative-driven adventure that keeps the well-known mechanics of the franchise and transports you to an 80s summer camp with kids to teach, crafts to build, and monsters to combat when the moon is high.

#IGN #KingdomEighties
